Posts.Content: TCcheermom wrote: I have been having extreme pain in right breast for 6 weeks and numbing and tingling in right arm. Found a lump at 10:00, 7 cm from nipple. I had mammogram and ultra sound today and the mass is palpable  2cm. I have a core biopsy set for 4/28/14 to many days away. really scared and in extreme pain and not sure what it is. Never any problems with breast. I am 50 years old and no history of breast cancer in the family. Any help and suggestion I  would be gratful. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: help newbie TCcheermom MrsLce
